price: 42. Il n’y aura de poursuite que contre ceux qui commettent des injustices envers les autres, qui se livrent, sans juste raison, aux abus sur terre : ceux-là subiront un supplice très douloureux.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَظۡلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبۡغُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-sabīlu ʿalā alladhīna yaẓlimūna al-nāsa wayabghūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi ulāika lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
